title: Data Visualization - Tutorial: Generating a Pie Chart
description: This tutorial will guide you through generating a pie chart to visualize proportions of a whole, using the Data Visualization module's direct Python functions. We'll cover basic customizations like exploding slices, adding percentages, and saving the output.
